metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39359 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In GNOME libgda through 6.0.0, gda-web-provider.c does not enable TLS certificate verification on the SoupSessionSync objects it creates, leaving users vulnerable to network MITM attacks. NOTE: this is similar to CVE-2016-20011.

criterions.comment: libgda5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
